topupAmountToReceiveHint: This is the amount that will be added in { currency }.
topupErrorMinAmount: The minimum amount to deposit is { amount }.
topupErrorMaxAmount: The maximum amount to deposit is { amount }.
topupFormText: Please enter the amount you wish to deposit.
topupDisclaimerHeader: Conditions for the contribution in {depositCurrency} in exchange for mutual credit units ({receiveCurrency})
topupDisclaimerText:
By making the financial contribution to {group}, the user declares to have read and accepted the following conditions:

**1. Nature of the operation**

The contribution in {depositCurrency} is voluntary and is made with the aim of contributing to the proper functioning of {group}.
The member's balance will be increased in mutual credit units ({receiveCurrency}), according to the ratio {rateDescription}. This ratio may be modified in the future.

**2. Non-convertible equivalence**

Mutual credit units **do not represent money**, nor any financial asset, nor any right of convertibility.
In no case shall the user have the right to:
 - Receive reimbursement in {depositCurrency} of the recorded units.
 - Demand compensation in kind, products or services.

**3. Function of mutual credit**

The {receiveCurrency} units serve exclusively to account for exchanges of products and services between members of {group}, within its internal mutual credit system. They have no legal value nor can they be used outside this framework.

**4. User responsibilities**

By performing the operation, the user confirms that:

 - They understand the functioning of the exchange and mutual credit system.
 - They accept the non-monetary, non-convertible and community nature of the {receiveCurrency} units.
topupCheckoutText: Please review the details of your top up below. You will be redirected to the payment provider.
topupSettingsText: Configure how users can top up their accounts using external payment methods.
topupEnableHint: Allow users to top up their accounts. This feature must be enabled by a superadmin.
topupDefaultAllowTopupHint: Allow all accounts to top up by default. If disabled, you must enable it for each account individually.
topupRateHint: Set the rate as a fraction n/d. For example, if 8 {receiveCurrency} = 15 {depositCurrency}, set it to 8/15.
topupRateInvalid: Invalid rate format. Use n or n/d (e.g., 8/15).
topupMinAmountHint: Minimum amount allowed for a single top up.
topupMaxAmountHint: Maximum amount allowed for a single top up.
topupMollieApiKeyHint: Enter the Mollie API Key. Leave empty to keep the current one.
